text: 1:11-12 Efesus 1:18-19; 3:16; 4:2Ezɨ ga kamaghɨn God ko mɨgei, an gavgavir ekiar aghuimɨn, God gavgaviba bar ia danɨngtɨ, ia tuivigh gavgavigh osɨmtɨziba ateram, egh aghumra ikɨva osɨmtɨziba gɨvaghamin dughiam mɨzuam. Egh ia bar akueghɨva, en Afeziam mɨnabagh. A ia gamizɨma ia arazir aghuibar gɨn zui, egh bizir aghuir a ia bagha mɨseveziba iniam. Ia Godɨn gumazamiziba ko da iniam, kar Godɨn Nguibamɨn angazangarimɨn aven itir darasi.
